name: 5th Cataclysm
summary: 5th Catacylsm is a JRPG-style Deckbuilder hybrid featuring randomly generated loot, enemies, and a dungeon to explore.

name: 5th Era
summary: A techno-fantasy JRPG inspired by the 16-bit classics. Explore Helgon, the city on the comet, uncover ancient secrets, and battle the deadly Brightlings in strategic turn-based combat as you uncover the truth behind the mysterious white portals.

name: 5th Dimension
summary: 5th Dimension is a sci-fi world builder and RPG MMO that empowers players to create, and then control a limitless virtual world.

name: 5till L1 Complex
summary: 5till L1 Complex is single-level PWAD designed by Lainos for Doom II. It was released in 2012 and requires a limit removing source port. The mod uses a music track and intermission music from the anime series Angel Beats! while replacing the title music with silence.

name: 5th Anniversary
summary: A compilation of ten games for Amiga and Commodore 64 from Rainbow Arts.

name: 5th Gear
summary: You participate in an illegal car race in which you are allowed to use every possible method to win.

name: 5th Fleet
summary: "The 5th Fleet" is a modern naval warfare game where you are in command of a U.S. Navy task in the Indian Ocean. You will have at your command a wide range of ships and aircrafts, with over 160 different units like Nimitz class carriers, Ticonderoga class cruisers and F-117A Stealth Fighter. Only ten scenarios are included in the game, but each one will probably require you several tries before you can complete it. There are indications in the manual for the time necessary to finish a scenario, given in number of turns and also expressed in hours, and sometimes even in days, knowing that a turn is equal to eight hours of real time. The game can be played by two players on the same computer or through electronic mail, or one against the computer.
